title: Was Wall Street originally the site of a "border wall " to protect the new Amsterdam?
subtitle: The social media compared a wall built along the northern border of Amsterdam during the 17th century with the border wall of President Donald Trump.
author: David Emery
vclaim: In the 17th century, New Amsterdam built a wall along its northern ocean (similar to the Trump border wall) to preserve the "bad dwarfs," but failed to achieve its declared purpose of successfully invading the city by sea.
